sen.j: 瀞峡（どろきょう）とは、和歌山県・三重県・奈良県を流れる北山川の峡谷。
sen.e: Doro Gorge (Dorokyo) is a gorge in Kitayama-gawa River, which flows through Wakayama Prefecture, Mie Prefecture, and Nara Prefecture.
Doro Gorge (Dorokyo) is a gorge in the Kitayama-gawa River, which flows through Wakayama Prefecture, Mie Prefecture, and Nara Prefecture.
sen.cmt: Kitayama-gawa River に定冠詞を付与
sen.e: Doro Gorge (Dorokyo) is a gorge in the Kitayama-gawa River, which flows through Wakayama Prefecture, Mie Prefecture, and Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 吉野熊野国立公園の一部。
sen.e: It is a part of Yoshino-Kumano National Park.
It is a part of Yoshino-Kumano National Park.
It is a part of Yoshino-Kumano National Park.

sen.j: 上流から、奥瀞、上瀞、下瀞と呼ばれ、下瀞は瀞八丁の名で特に著名である。
sen.e: From the upstream, it is called Okudoro, Kamidoro, and Shimodoro, and Shimodoro is especially famous in the name of Dorohaccho Gorge.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: From the upstream, it is called Okudoro, Kamidoro, and Shimodoro, and Shimodoro is especially famous in the name of Dorohaccho Gorge.
From the upstream, it is called Okudoro, Kamidoro, and Shimodoro, and Shimodoro is especially famous in the name of Dorohaccho Gorge.

sen.j: 巨岩、奇岩、断崖が続く圧倒的な渓谷美は、古くから名勝と讃えられている。
sen.e: Overwhelming beauty of the gorge formed by gigantic rocks, odd rocks, cliffs has been praised as a place of scenic beauty since ancient times.
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: Overwhelming beauty of the gorge formed by gigantic rocks, odd rocks, cliffs has been praised as a place of scenic beauty since ancient times.
Overwhelming beauty of the gorge formed by gigantic rocks, odd rocks, cliffs has been praised as a place of scenic beauty since ancient times.

sen.j: 和歌山県東牟婁郡北山村（上流）
sen.e: Kitayama Village, Higashimuro County, Wakayama Prefecture (upstream)
Kitayama Village, Higashimuro County, Wakayama Prefecture (upstream)
Kitayama Village, Higashimuro County, Wakayama Prefecture (upstream)

sen.j: 奈良県十津川村竹筒（下流）
sen.e: Taketo, Totsukawa village, Nara Prefecture (downstream)
Taketo, Totsukawa village, Nara Prefecture (downstream)
Taketo, Totsukawa village, Nara Prefecture (downstream)
Shingu City Wakayama Prefecture (downstream)
Shingu City Wakayama Prefecture (downstream)
Shingu City Wakayama Prefecture (downstream)

sen.j: 地形輪廻準平原である大台ヶ原山周辺から流れを発した川が滝を形成し、侵食作用によって滝つぼが後退して形成された。
sen.e: A basin of the waterfall that was developed by the river derived from the periphery of Mt. Odaigahara, which is peneplane in cycle of erosion, was developed as the waterfall receded due to erosion.
sen.cmt: 地形輪廻準平原→定訳不明ですが→peneplane in cycle of erosionと訳出しています。
sen.e: A river originated at the periphery of Mt. Odaigahara, which was a peneplane in cycle of erosion, formed a waterfall; then the basin of the waterfall was receded due to erosion and formed the gorge.
A river originated at the periphery of Mt. Odaigahara, which was a peneplane in cycle of erosion, formed a waterfall; then the basin of the waterfall was receded due to erosion and formed the gorge.

sen.j: ウォータージェット推進船乗り場
sen.e: Water jet promoting boat boarding point
Water jet promoting boat boarding point
Water jet promoting boat boarding point

sen.j: JR紀勢本線 新宮駅 から熊野交通バス「熊野本宮」行きで35分、「志古」下車
sen.e: After 35 minutes by KUMANO KOTSU line bus, `Kumano-hongu Shrine-bound' from Shingu Station of JR Kisei Main Line and get off the bus stop, `Shiko'
After 35 minutes by KUMANO KOTSU line bus, `Kumano-hongu Shrine-bound' from Shingu Station of the JR Kisei Main Line and get off at the bus stop, `Shiko'

sen.e: After 35 minutes by KUMANO KOTSU line bus, `Kumano-hongu Shrine-bound' from Shingu Station of the JR Kisei Main Line and get off at the bus stop, `Shiko'

sen.j: JR紀勢本線 新宮駅 から熊野交通バス「熊野本宮」行きで40分、「宮井大橋」下車。
sen.e: After 40 minutes by KUMANO KOTSU line bus, `Kumano-hongu Shrine-bound,' from Shingu Station of JR Kisei Main Line, and get off at the bus stop, `Miyai Ohashi.'
sen.cmt: 一原文・一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: After 40 minutes by KUMANO KOTSU line bus, `Kumano-hongu Shrine-bound,' from Shingu Station of the JR Kisei Main Line, and get off at the bus stop, `Miyai Ohashi.'

sen.j: 熊野交通バス「玉置口」行きに乗換えて30分、終点下車。
sen.e: Transfer to KUMANO KOTSU line bus, `Tamakiguchi'-bound, and get off the bus at the last bus stop after 30 minutes ride.
